front.title: More Instant Messaging Interoperability (MIMI) problem outline

abstract.t: Instant Messaging interoperability requirements have changed dramatically since the IETF last activity in the space. This document presents an outline of problems that need to be addressed to make possible interoperability of modern Instant Messaging systems. The goal of this problem outline is to point at more detailed drafts which spawn discussion and eventually spur the IETF standards process.
